Description.zhCN:
基础工作单位。用于采集晶体矿和高能瓦斯。可以变异为建筑。

可以对地。
Description.enUS:
Basic work unit. Used to collect crystal minerals and high-energy gas. Can be mutated into buildings.

Can target the ground.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам двигаться в указанную точку или следовать за указанной целью. При этом они не будут вступать в бой с возможным противником.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам прекратить выполнение всех задач и остановиться.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам оставаться на месте и атаковать противника в зоне досягаемости, при этом не преследуя его и не приближаясь к нему, чтобы вступить в бой.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам двигаться в выбранную точку, вступая в бой с противниками, которые встретятся по пути. Указав в качестве цели конкретную боевую единицу, вы прикажете атаковать ее до уничтожения.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам курсировать между текущей позицией и выбранной точкой. Обнаружив противника, они будут приближаться на расстояние атаки и вступать в бой.

Tooltip.enUS: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выгрузить ресурсы в ближайший приемный пункт.

Tooltip.enUS: A list of basic structures.
Tooltip.ruRU: Открывает список основных строений.

Tooltip.enUS: A list of advanced structures.
Tooltip.ruRU: Открывает список дополнительных строений.

Tooltip.zhCN: 命令单位钻回地表。
Tooltip.enUS: Order units to drill back to the surface.
Orders Drone to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказывает рабочему добывать ресурсы на месторождении минералов или из веспенового гейзера.

Tooltip.zhCN: 清道夫的每次攻击穿透20%的护甲并额外造成1点法术伤害。
Tooltip.enUS: Each attack of Scavenger penetrates 20%'s armor and deals an additional 1 point of spell damage.

Tooltip.zhCN: 命令单位潜入地下。单位潜地后无法移动或攻击，但处于隐形状态。
Tooltip.enUS: Order units to go underground. A unit cannot move or attack while burrowed, but is invisible.

Tooltip.zhCN: 清道夫在菌毯上能够提升移动速度。
Tooltip.enUS: Scavenger can increase movement speed on creep.

Tooltip.zhCN:
拥有护盾
护盾在脱战长时间后缓慢恢复，拥有较高的护甲。
在菌毯上时能够更快恢复护盾。
Tooltip.enUS:
Has a shield
The shield recovers slowly after being out of combat for a long time, and has higher armor.
Restores shields faster while on creep.

Name.zhCN: 变异为利维坦孵化场

Tooltip.zhCN:
主要建筑
能够孵化所有异虫单位并接收采集到的资源。可以生成菌毯，满足附近异虫建筑的存活需求。
可以变异为虫穴。

效果加成：异虫单位在菌毯上的移动速度更快
Tooltip.enUS:
The main building
is capable of hatching all Zerg units and receiving harvested resources. Creep carpet can be generated to meet the survival needs of nearby zerg buildings.
Can mutate into Insect Lair.

Bonus effect: Zerg units move faster on creep

Tooltip.zhCN:
基础建筑
建造在瓦斯气泉上，用于采集高能瓦斯。
Tooltip.enUS:
Basic building
is built on a gas spring and is used to collect high-energy gas.

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
开启异虫基础单位。
可孵化噬兽。

开启：
- 使母巢幼虫可以变异为噬兽
- 使清道夫可以变异为湮灭虫巢
- 使利维坦孵化场可以变异为利维坦虫穴
Tooltip.enUS:
Tech Building
Turns on the Zerg base unit.
Can hatch Eater.

Enable:
- Allows Brood Larvae to mutate into Beast
- Allows Scavenger to mutate into Hive Annihilation
- Allows Leviathan Hatchery to mutate into Leviathan Worm Lair

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
开启更多异虫变异与防御建筑。
可孵化脊针爬虫、孢子爬虫与恶性畸变体。

开启：
- 使清道夫可以变异为脊针爬虫
- 使清道夫可以变异为孢子爬虫
- 使王虫可以变异为阿尔法王虫
Tooltip.enUS:
Technological Buildings
Opens more Zerg mutations and defensive buildings.
Hatches Spine Crawler, Spore Crawler and Malignant Aberrations Body.

Enable:
- Allows Scavenger to mutate into Spine Crawler
- Allows Scavenger to mutate into Spore Crawler
- Allows Kingworm to mutate into Alpha Kingworm< /c>

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
可孵化骇甲虫。

开启：
- 使母巢幼虫可以变异为骇甲虫
Tooltip.enUS:
Tech buildings
can hatch Dread Beetles.

Enable:
- Allows Brood Larvae to mutate into Dread Beetle
Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить текущий приказ и отдать следующий.

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
开启湮灭虫。
可孵化巨型湮灭虫。

开启：
- 使噬兽可以变异为湮灭虫
Tooltip.enUS:
Technology Building
Turn on Annihilation Pest.
Hatches Giant Annihilation Bugs.

Enable:
- Allows Eating Beast to mutate into Annihilation

Tooltip.zhCN:
防御建筑
主要对地防御建筑。

可以对地。
Tooltip.enUS:
Defense Building
Mainly ground defense building.

Can target the ground.

Tooltip.zhCN:
防御建筑
主要防空建筑。

可以对空。
侦测单位
Tooltip.enUS:
Defense Building
Main air defense building.

Can be used against air.
Detection unit

Name.zhCN: 变异为胆汁喷射体

Tooltip.zhCN:
防御建筑
远距离攻击防御建筑。能够喷射胆汁轰炸目标区域，伤害区域内的地面和空中单位。
Tooltip.enUS:
Defense Building
Attack defensive buildings from a distance. Able to spray bile to bombard the target area, damaging ground and air units in the area.

Name.zhCN: 变异为屠猎者巢穴

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
可孵化屠猎者。
可孵化屠猎者。

开启：
- 使母巢幼虫可以变异为屠猎者
Tooltip.enUS:
Tech Building
can hatch Hunter.
Can hatch Hunter.

Enable:
- Allows Brood Larvae to mutate into Hunter

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
开启利维坦基础空军单位。
可孵化骇翼、弑杀蜂和溃蚀者。
可以变异为宏伟尖塔。

开启：
- 使母巢幼虫可以变异为骇翼
- 使母巢幼虫可以变异为弑杀蜂
- 使母巢幼虫可以变异为溃蚀者
Tooltip.enUS:
Tech Building
Opens the Leviathan basic air unit.
Hatches Dreadwing, Killer Bee and Corruption who.
Can mutate into Magnificent Spire.

Enable:
- Allows Brood Larvae to mutate into Dreadwing
- Allows Brood Larva to mutate into Killer Bee
- Allows Brother Larva to mutate into Utter who

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
可孵化暴龙兽、狰兽。

开启：
- 使母巢幼虫可以变异为暴龙兽
Tooltip.enUS:
Technology Building
can hatch Greymon, Greymon beast.

Enable:
- Allows Brood Larvae to mutate into Greymon
Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить текущий приказ и отдать следующий.

Name.zhCN: 变异为利维坦虫道中枢

Tooltip.zhCN:
防御建筑
地面单位可借助虫道网络在任何该玩家拥有的利维坦坑道虫或利维坦虫道中枢间穿梭。

开启：
- 坑道虫
- 坑道龙
- 菌塔
Tooltip.enUS:
Defensive Structures
Ground units can use the Worm Network to attack any Leviathan Nydus Worms or Leviathan Insect Channel Center.

Enable:
- Dynadus Worm
- Tundao Dragon
- Bacteria Tower

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
开启更高级异虫单位与建筑。
可孵化腐坏使者与主巢育母。

开启：
- 使母巢幼虫可以变异为瘟疫使者
- 使母巢幼虫可以变异为主巢育母
- 使利维坦虫穴可以变异为利维坦主巢
Tooltip.enUS:
Tech Buildings
Opens higher-level Zerg units and buildings.
Can hatch Bringer of Corruption and Hive Broodmother.

Enable:
- Allows Brood Larvae to mutate into Plaguebringer
- Allows Brood Larva to mutate into Hive Broodmother
- Allows Leviathan Bug Lair to mutate into Leviathan Main Nest

Tooltip.zhCN:
科技建筑
可孵化裂地者与梦魇虫。

开启：
- 使屠猎者可以变异为裂地者。
- 使骇甲虫可以变异为梦魇虫。
Tooltip.enUS:
Tech Building
can hatch Earthbreaker and Nightmare Worm .

Enable:
- Allows Slayer to mutate into Earthbreaker.
- Allows Dread Beetle to mutate into Nightmare Bug.

Name.zhCN: 单位变异(工蜂 -> 异虫建筑)

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам двигаться в указанную точку или следовать за указанной целью. При этом они не будут вступать в бой с возможным противником.
